itemDescription: Vice president of the World Curling Federation (1929-2009)

wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Paterson-Brown  (28 January 1929 – 13 January 2009) was a Scottish curler who held the position of vice-president for the World Curling Federation from 1990 to 1994. She was awarded the Freytag Award in 1996 and inducted into the WCF Hall of Fame in 2002. Paterson-Brown was named a Member of the Order of the British Empire in 1999.

response: *Elizabeth Paterson-Brown, 87, Scottish curler.Elizabeth Paterson-Brown: Curler and administrator
